author: billbarker
msg: Ignore '$' chars that aren't part of a '${' replacement pattern.
Unlike with ant (which of course is what this is based off of), with this patch you no longer have "$$" -> "$".
Based on patch by:  Richard Clark rgc197@zepler.org

author: mturk
msg: Use proper installation path for jakarta virtual directory.

author: remm
msg: - If the encoding is invalid, this will cause a weird NPE. This avoids it.
- The usage of a bad encoding should have been logged elsewhere in all cases, so I don't see the point of logging again.

author: mturk
msg: Use XML for saving project file.
